trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event occurs when rows are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>加入資料列時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler> in virtual mode to store the fact that a row has been added.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler>中儲存的資料列已加入的虛擬模式。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>參考主題。
